long_description: The comprehensive. Author: Craig Romano. Softcover; 301 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2011. . At-a-glace planner offers suggested campsites. Topographic maps provide a sense of each hike. Icons indicate trails for older kids, dogs, wildflower lovers, history buffs or solitude seekers. Offers information on permits, flora and fauna, trail etiquette and more.
short_description: The comprehensive Backpacking Washington offers 70 of the finest overnight and multiday routes in the state.
